channel.title: Need help whit wepon spec client 317
channel.description: ok on my server they only have dds spec and claws spec working but the claws spec bug some time dont know why so i want delete them and change them back. kuz i want to add every dragon wep spec and add every godsword spec whit animation could some 1 help me whit this like i need a guide or some thing like that P.s sorry for my bad grammer

item.title: Need help whit wepon spec client 317
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. I don’t understand what you’re trying to say.
  2. Nobody is going to spoon-feed you, attempt it yourself and we will help you afterwards.
  3. Use Google and the Search feature, there’s over 9000 tutorials on how to do this.

Read full topic
